articles.description: Giving Brendon McCullum responsibility for all teams was the best appointment England could make, but questions remain, says Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: Brendon McCullum: Questions after England appoint new white-ball coach

articles.description: Phil Foden, Cole Palmer and Ollie Watkins have withdrawn from the England squad for their upcoming Nations League fixtures.
articles.title: England squad: Phil Foden, Cole Palmer and Ollie Watkins withdraw from Nations League fixtures

articles.description: The summer transfer window has closed but who are the best free agents clubs can still sign?
articles.title: Premier League: Who are the best free agents still looking for a club?

articles.description: Leicester win an appeal against a decision that could have led to a points deduction for an alleged breach of Premier League Profit and Sustainability rules.
articles.title: Leicester City: Club win appeal against Premier League charge

articles.description: Taylor Fritz ends his run of Grand Slam quarter-final disappointment by beating Alexander Zverev to reach the US Open semi-finals.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Taylor Fritz beats Alexander Zverev to reach first Grand Slam semi-final

articles.description: England international Millie Bright has been named an ambassador for children's mental health charity YoungMinds.
articles.title: Millie Bright: England and Chelsea defender named ambassador of mental health charity

articles.description: ParalympicsGB pick up early medals on the track and in the Para-equestrian arena with more likely to follow in the pool on day six at the Paris Paralympics.
articles.title: Paris 2024: GB win day six medals with more set to follow

articles.description: Adrian Newey’s manager Eddie Jordan says he is "not prepared to answer" questions on whether the Formula 1 design legend is to join Aston Martin.
articles.title: Adrian Newey: Eddie Jordan 'not prepared' to discuss F1 designer's future

articles.description: As Uruguay striker Luis Suarez retires from international football, BBC Sport looks at how he became one of Europe's best.
articles.title: Luis Suarez retires: How Uruguay striker became one of Europe's best

articles.description: Russian athlete Tatyana Tomashova is banned for 10 years by the Court of Arbitration for Sport and is stripped of her London 2012 1500m silver medal for doping.
articles.title: Tatyana Tomashova banned: Runner in 2012 'dirtiest race' gets 10-year ban
